Summary: I posses my prsonal Internet site. There you can find some photos scetches and other information www.ufobase.org. The site will be activated on Monday or Thusday
divs: Sighting DetailsFrom July 20,1985 to December 11, 1987 I resided in the German Federal Republic. Everything that I am going to write about here started in January 1987. I am going to write about everything starting from fall 1987. I was sitting with Tamils from Sri Lanka at a table at St. Vienhorst 28 in L���hne where I was residing. We were drinking whisky and eating specialties. Suddenly something started to send to my head information in the rhythm of my pulse that They were already there and that was supposed to look at the red sunset. When I did this and looked around I saw red spots with red ribbons. Several days elapsed during which I talked with THEM in this way, and THEY were sending information to my head in the rhythm of my pulse and then something happened, and I am going to write about this below. We went out of the house with Africans people who were also residents of the house to start my car. One of them was sitting behind the steering wheel while I and the others were pushing the car, suddenly I heard the sound of a jet plane. Later, it turned out that this was the German Luftwaffe plane, because it was labeled. I saw a distinct label F-111 on the plane. When F-111 was above the roof of our house (it was a one ���floor building) under the plane we saw a small starship, which I gave in Pictures 1a and 1b. At that moment I started to run along the road under the plane and the small starship and I went on shouting at THEM to take away the plane. Then I heard a voice from starship, saying ��� No, our smallone this plane will go one flying and our nymph, which is flying the small starship will protect the pilot, an Afroamerican from any danger���. THEY also told me that F-111 is an Electric and Germans call it Fockewulf 111. The plane flew above the house and so did the small starship. The starship overtook the plane, and then disappeared in the clouds. Probably the antimatter layer around the starship was closed. Then there was a big flying disc. I was on my way to the City Hall in Lohne on some business. When I came closer towards the river I was about to look at the sky when I saw a huge flying disc suspended at an angle from the sky, which I presented in Picture 2. I think the disc was about 300 m in diameter. On the river bank I also saw a sitting cat, who was also staring at the disc. One day I was in the kitchen and I wanted to come closer to the window as THEY from starships wanted me to do. A minute late a green Opel Kadett passed the street. THEY told me that the passenger of that car is someone from the object and that he is my relative. THEY wanted me to pay attention to the shape of his head, which I saw. The gentleman was ideally bald and THEY told me that the back of his head was an elephant���s head. As I have just mentioned THEY were communicating with me through sending information to my head in the rhythm of my pulse. However, I told THEM that this way of communicating was bothering me. Hearing this THEY started to use my voice organs for communication. This is how They do this: I stop thinking and then THEY start to speak through me. I respond through my thoughts. And this has continued to the present and THEY always talk to me in Polish. I must confess that I see flashlights in the sky emitted from objects closed in antimatter. I also see silhouettes of objects and rarely objects with opened fuselages. Until Septemper 2003 I lived in the center of Krakow and I watched the sky from my balcony or from the opened window. Now, I do this same from small city Wieliczka situated close to Krakow where I live at present. I can see flashing every minute and THEY flash especially at me. Walking on the street I am trying to look at the sky and at the people and then I see that no one is looking at the sky. Everyone is so busy and hectic, whereas I am looking at the sky every free minute and THEY reply with flashlight. At the Picture 3 you can find drawing of Big Flying Disc seen from its side I think that the starship is 300 meter in diameter. I have already learned from THEM that THEY are a Cosmic Empire from Outer- Space with an abode in Ksyros in the planetary constellation of Sirius. Ksyros is a planet where only abode of Empire is located but the Cosmic Empire from Outer- Space includes many more planets. THEY told me that the Earth is very precious planet as there is life on it. THEY told me that my grand- father Kazimierz Nakielski was very important to THEM and now I am like my grand-father was to THEM. Now I am going to explain what it was about. In 1908 the so called Tungus meteorite exploded in Siberia. I know from THEM that it was a small starship destroyed after leaving some people on the Earth ( some UFO devils). They escaped from the Empire and that is why they destroyed the starship They were: my grand-father Kazimierz Nakielski who was THEIR emperor and my maternal grand- father and grand-mother. THEY told me that my grand-father Kazimierz Nakielski was not only my grand-father but , he trough genes of Zbigniew ,Kazimir was my father. Thus, I have known about THEM since 1987, however I saw something as early 1984 and it may be possible that there has been someone above me since my birth . Besides, I have some proof that I know of, that I belong to THEM. As far as Antimatter is concerned, we do not know much about it. The simplest way to explain this phenomenon is to do it on the example of the hydrogen atom. It is assumed that if a hydrogen atom built of antimatter existed than the electron would have a positive potential and the atom nucleus would be built of negative protons. When a hydrogen atom built of matter clashed with hydrogen atom built of an antimatter energy would be released and an explosion would follow. However, I think that as the chain reaction my be controlled in nuclear reactors the same is with antimatter, then it can be used, for example, as ��� a cap of invisibility��� to hide matter in it. I know that THEY keep THEIR starships into an antimatter and in this way THEY are invisible and undetectable- THEY may move above the Earth. Antimatter may also be used as a kind of a bumper and may protect a space ship against other objects of matter in the space. I know that THEY are interested in nuclear weapon on the Earth and in the fact that raw material and fuel resources are coming to an end. THEY also told me that ice era is coming. As I know there is some kind of THEIR base above me, so wherever I go THEY go with me. Since 1987 I have been several times in Germany and THEY have always been and still are above me. I stayed longest in L���hne- three months in 1995- the air traffic was fairly heavy at that time ( army planes, helicopters). I think their radars were showing something as it could have when I was first time in Germany. I know that the army keeps such information secret. I have got something from the Empire so I can always locate THEM. This is a spot ��� a white round spot. If I look directly at a wall the spot is small but when I look at the sky the spot grows. However the spot never causes any difficulties for my sight. I am not color-blind and my sight is good. The spot is yellowish when the weather is bad. If, for example I am on the train the spot glitters on roadside poles. Kind of phenomenon emitted from objects which are observed by myself. Daylight observations Flashes similar to flashes emitted from stroboscopic tube , emitted during daytime and the light is the size of a star which is seen by night and a the flash lasts about one second. What is possible to see is blue sky cut by white or gray, longitudinal, or oval haze, it also lasts about one second. It is harder (seldom) to observe outlines of starships to be visible from beyond the curtain of an antimatter. It is possible to observe a thin long line that can be positioned in the sky under different angles or small starships like the starship from L���hne. However I must add that starships are not visible distinctly as I mentioned before I can see only outlines of starships. I have to add in this place that the phenomenon exists about one second too. I think that starships are visible this way because in that way they can not be traced by radar. I want to add that such observation of what is emitted by starships can be done in every atmospheric circumstances but I would suggest that show somebody what I see in the sky during clear weather for the first time. On the completely cloudly sky it is possible to see the same as during clear weather but it is necessary to know what and where to watch. It is important also to posses some of practice in observation such phenomenon as described by myself. B. Night observations At night especially with cloudless, starlit sky it is difficult for me to show somebody the phenomenon emitted from objects if the person has not a practice to make the observations. At the beginning I would like to stay on daylight observations. The flashlight emitted from the starships may be divided as follows: delicate flashlight sharp flashlight (vivid) jumping flashlight flashlight similar to the sunlight reflected in the mirror In my opinion I am the only person that can see the flashlight and this is connected with the spot ( white round fog) that I have described above. Flashlight from point 1,2, and 3 is similar to flashlight emitted by stroboscopic lamp used, for example, in still cameras, however, this flashlight is smaller. I like mankind efforts to find out and to traverse outer-space but I have to add , as THEY told me, Solar System belongs to the Earth and precisely speaking, it belongs to civilization on the Earth. They do not want to be interfere in people���s activity in this area but behind the solar system outer- space is controlled by objects ��� starships of Cosmic Empire. THEY told me that I am a ���Son of the Sun��� and ��� Ensign of Galaxy Border Guard���. Let me still explain, as THEY told me, that Solar System is situated on the border of two galaxies and that���s the reason it���s very far everywhere. Above the Earth move starships of Galaxy Border Guard. I know that THEY are above me since more then 19 years and more than 19 years I observe THEIR starships and signals, I talk with THEM and THEY told me that THEY will be over me to the end of my life. I learned from THEM that Haley���s Comet is used as a space station to observe solar system and especially the Earth that is worth a lot for THEM because here is life. I would like to add that THEY try to avoid a fluence in a lot of matters on the Earth . THEY can show THEIR starships and THEY do it often and I got to like about that. I can see starships any times everyday. I also learned from THEM that inside the starships belonged to Cosmic Empire, space is filled by Hydro Cyan. THEY are in such environment and THEY breath with the gas. They do not have needs such as to eat, to drink water or any other liquids. I have to add that they are also human beings, so you can call THEM Spacemen (do not say Aliens). To stay in environment filled with hydro cyan protect a human being do not be mad because of speed of light. I think that it is possible to reach or even cross Speed of light, when both a body hidden in an antimattery and the antimatter are changed in a photon. Enclosed please find a reply from Hong Kong Lama. The reply refers to what I have just written to you. The lama does not know and what I know, so I can not agree with him in every points of his points of view. However, I think that what I have experienced is wonderful. THEY did not do me any harm, just the opposite THEY cured me from hay fever and my twisted ankle. I like THEM to take me to THEIR starships although as THEY told me I would not be able to come back to the Earth. I am sure the police will keep me in their files as lost.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Krakow
This sighting has never been favorited.
